General.Name: Zhengzhou GL Tech Co Ltd
General.Description: GL Tech Co.,Ltd offers safety production monitoring equipment and semiconductor packaging and testing equipment in China and internationally. It offers safety production monitoring products, such as gas drainage monitoring systems and metering equipment, fire monitoring systems, and other security products; energy saving and environmental protection products, including energy-saving products and environmental protection products; and electronic control system. The company was formerly known as Zhengzhou Gl Tech Co.,Ltd and changed its name to GL Tech Co.,Ltd in September 2017. GL Tech Co.,Ltd was founded in 1994 and is headquartered in Zhengzhou, China.
General.Address: National High-tech Industrial Dev Zone, Zhengzhou, China, 450001

1.Name: Mr. Wei  Cao
